_header: Shall I mother maiden and wife
_description: James Ryman song, 14 cross-rhymed quatrains with the first repeated after the remaining 13 as if a burden.

CULEe112.First Lines:
Shalle I moder mayden & wyfeMy dere spowse shalle I
                    sooShall I for mankyende yelde my lyfeAnd suffre payne and
                    wooShalle I honge vpone the RoodeModer it shall be
                    soo…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And bringe man to that blis for ayWhere nevir shall be
                    woo
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 229-31.
